bullets: Power demand narratives increasingly mention data centers and electrification.
Oil and gas coverage emphasized supply discipline and demand uncertainty.
Renewables commentary focused on grid integration and financing.
Policy headlines affected permitting and subsidy expectations.
Utility earnings discussed capex for transmission and resilience.
insights: Grid investment is a recurring driver across utilities and equipment suppliers.
Policy and rates matter as much as commodity prices for some energy stocks.

clusters.title: Grid upgrades and reliability
clusters.summary: Stories highlighted transmission buildout and reliability spending as long-lived themes.

clusters.title: Commodity price narratives
clusters.summary: Coverage tied energy equities to oil, gas, and macro demand expectations.

disclaimer: Educational use only. Not financial advice.
